items.title: Spring Boot Healthchecks in Google Cloud Run
items.summary: Recently I have trying to convert some of our reference architecture to Google Cloud Run I came across an issue where my healthcheck were reporting "down". Which is kind of strange whe you consider I was able to get the the actuator helth check endppoint.
items.content_html: Recently I have trying to convert some of our reference architecture to Google Cloud Run I came across an issue where my healthcheck were reporting "down".  Which is kind of strange whe you consider I was able to get the the actuator helth check endppoint.
